    game - package game
     
    game - Variable in class handlers.models.InputHandler
    An instance of the game.
    gameboard - package gameboard
     
    gameboard - Variable in class game.GameProcessor
    The game board of the current level.
    gameboard - Static variable in class gameboard.GameboardGenerator
    Char representation of the game board.
    Gameboard - Class in gameboard
    The Gameboard class is responsible for tracking player, monster and treasure position.
    Gameboard(Level) - Constructor for class gameboard.Gameboard
    Constructs a Gameboard instance with the parameters from the level object.
    gameboardControls - Variable in class game.GameProcessor
    Holds the commands that are specific for the game.
    GameboardGenerator - Class in gameboard
    The GameboardGenerator class is responsible generating game boards.
    GameboardGenerator() - Constructor for class gameboard.GameboardGenerator
     
    gameboardLength - Static variable in class gameboard.GameboardGenerator
    Length of the game board.
    gameboardWidth - Static variable in class gameboard.GameboardGenerator
    Width of the game board.
    gameEvent - Variable in class game.GameProcessor
    Current game event.
    GameProcessor - Class in game
    The GameProcessor class is responsible for playing out the game logic.
    GameProcessor(InputHandler) - Constructor for class game.GameProcessor
    Constructs a GameProcessor instance for a classic game.
    GameProcessor(InputHandler, Level) - Constructor for class game.GameProcessor
    Constructs a GameProcessor instance for a custom game.
    generateBoard(int, int, int, int) - Static method in class gameboard.GameboardGenerator
    Generates a char matrix game board with the given parameters.
    generateLevel() - Static method in class game.RandomLevelGenerator
    The method uses Random instance to create a custom level object, that will be used for custom games.
    generateNextLevel() - Method in class game.GameProcessor
    Increases the level parameters.
    generatePaths(Cell) - Static method in class gameboard.GameboardGenerator
    Using recursive method, the method generate random paths,that the player can move on.
    generateTreasureList(int, int) - Static method in class treasures.models.TreasureListGenerator
    This method randomly generates a list of treasures, with random stats, depending on the level multiplier.
    getBasicAttack() - Method in class players.Player
    Gets basic attack.

    getCordY() - Method in class gameboard.Cell

    Gets current health.
    getHealth() - Method in class monster.Monster
    Gets the current health of the monster
    getLength() - Method in class game.Level
    Gets the length of the game board of the current level.
    getLevel() - Method in class game.Level
    Gets level difficulty of the current level.
    getMonsters() - Method in class game.Level

    getPlayerCords() - Method in class gameboard.Gameboard

    getSpellAttack() - Method in class players.Player

    getTreasureItem(TreasureType) - Method in class players.Player

    getTreasures() - Method in class game.Level
    Gets the number of treasures on the current level.
    getTreasureType() - Method in class treasures.models.Treasure
    Gets the treasure type of the treasure.
    getValidPathNeighbours(int, int) - Static method in class gameboard.GameboardGenerator
    Gets the coordinates of all the neighbours that are movable for the player.
    getWidth() - Method in class game.Level
    Gets the width of the game board of the current level.
